fxInfo_clarification: For this question, no limit means the constitution specifies there is no limit on the number of terms and not specified.
fxInfo_ordering: This question is asked only if HOCCJ is answered 2, or if HOCCJ is answered 3, or if HOCCJ is answered 4.
fxInfo_question: What restrictions are in place regarding the number of terms that members of the highest ordinary court may serve?

fxInfo_responses.value: No successive terms permitted, but multiple non-successive terms permitted
Only two successive terms permitted, but multiple non-successive terms permitted
Other, please specify in the comments section
